options.query:
| makeresults
| eval _raw = "
cn      displayName      mail                    dn                        manager                                 
dm123   Dean, Martin     dean.martin@test.eu     CN=dm123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   
ep123   Elvis, Presley   elvis.presley@test.eu   CN=ep123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   dm123
mj123   Michael, Jordan  michael.jordan@test.eu  CN=mj123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   ep123
bc123   Bill, Clinton    bill.clinton@test.eu    CN=bc123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   hc123
ba123   Buzz, Aldrin     buzz.aldrin@test.eu     CN=ba123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   mj123
ts123   Taylor, Swift    talor.swift@test.eu     CN=ts123,OU=T,OU=E,OU=S   ba123
hc123   Hillary, Clinton hillary.clinton@tet.eu  CN=hs123,OU-T,OU=E,OU=S   dm123"
| multikv forceheader=1
``` data emulation above for
| inputlookup ldap_users ```
| fields - _* linecount

| eval flatdata = cn . ":" . displayName . ":" . if(isnull(manager), "", manager)
| eventstats values(flatdata) as flatdata
| foreach 1 2 3 4 5 6
    [| eval manager = mvappend(manager, mvindex(split(mvindex(flatdata, mvfind(flatdata, "^" . mvindex(manager, -1) . ":")), ":"), 2))]
``` managerial hierarchy  built above ```

| eval manager = mvindex(split(mvindex(flatdata, mvfind(flatdata, "^" . mvindex(manager, 0) . ":")), ":"), 1)
| search manager = "$manager_tok$"
| stats values(displayName) as direct_reports dc(cn) as count by manager
| search direct_reports = "$displayName_tok$"
| eval manager = manager . " (" . count . ")"
| fields - count

| search displayName = "$displayName_tok$"
| eval report_chain = mvappend(if(isnull(report_chain), null(), displayName), mvmap(manager, mvindex(split(mvindex(flatdata, mvfind(flatdata, "^" . manager . ":")), ":"), 1)))
| search report_chain = "$manager_tok$"
| eval displayName = displayName . " \-" . mvcount(report_chain)
| eval report_chain = "^" . mvjoin(report_chain, "^")
| fields displayName report_chain

| eval jsondata = json_object(cn, json_object("displayName", displayName, "manager", manager))
| eventstats values(jsondata) as jsondata

| eval manager = mvindex(split(mvindex(flatdata, mvfind(flatdata, "^" . mvindex(manager, 0) . ":")), ":"), 1)
| stats count by manager
